author: Staff Reporter
text:
A senior sub-inspector attached to the Avadi Tank Factory police station died following a serious head injury he sustained when he fell down from his motorbike on Sunday night.

A senior official of the City Police said sub-inspector D. Srinivasan, 57, who lived at JP Estate in Avadi, was on night duty and was out on his rounds when the accident occurred.

The official said the sub-inspector was on the Heavy Vehicle Factory Estate Road, near the police station, when a herd of cattle suddenly crossed the road and hit his vehicle. As he was not wearing a helmet, he sustained head injuries due to the fall. He was rushed to the Rajiv Gandhi Government General Hospital for treatment, where he was pronounced dead on arrival. The officer suffered from health problems, it is learnt. The Avadi Traffic Investigation has registered a case is investigating.

title: Policeman on night patrol killed in accident in Avadi
